There isn't life after death. because your bible teaches you this does not necessarily constitute reality. Most religions are culture based, hence most Christians cannot specify why they follow in that faith other than they were born into believing a fictional story written by """"who knows"""" and edited by king James et al...to suite the reader. How different are you from other animals that walk this earth? Same animals that you hunt down and kill to satisfy your thirst and hunger...same animals that share most anatomical composition as we humans, and you tell me those animals are not worthy of your heaven? To answer your question, yes. I do tend to look at people oddly when they drink cow's milk because I think it's disgusting. For those who don't look at others oddly when they drink cow's milk, their reasonings are likely because when we drink cow's milk, it's usually out of a cup, which comes from a carton/jug/bag. We don't generally see grown humans hanging off of a cow's udder when they want a drink. That would be weird.. and we would look at them oddly.
